title: New Solr Web UI does not work correctly if contextPath differs from /solr
description:
Solr Web UI Javascript file solr/webapp/web/js/angular/services.js uses hard coded /solr contextPath for resources.

Therefore new UI  does not work correctly with contextPath other then /solr 
(by example http://stackoverflow.com/questions/34772611/override-contextpath-on-solr-start-from-command-line)

comments.author: Cassandra Targett
comments.content: This seems to be a duplicate of two other already duplicated issues, SOLR-9000 and SOLR-9054.
